title: American Sociological Review - Racial Discrimination in Housing: How Landlords Use Algorithms and Home Visits to Screen Tenants
itunes:title: American Sociological Review - Racial Discrimination in Housing: How Landlords Use Algorithms and Home Visits to Screen Tenants
description: Authors Eva Rosen, Philip Garboden, and Jennifer Cossyleon discuss their article, "Racial Discrimination in Housing: How Landlords Use Algorithms and Home Visits to Screen Tenants," published in the October 2021 issue of American Sociological Review.
content:encoded: Authors Eva Rosen, Philip Garboden, and Jennifer Cossyleon discuss their article, "Racial Discrimination in Housing: How Landlords Use Algorithms and Home Visits to Screen Tenants," published in the October 2021 issue of American Sociological Review.
